Plot: A Chicago teenager is looking for fun at home while his parents are away, but the situation quickly gets out of hand.
Title: Risky Business
Actors: Tom Cruise, Rebecca De Mornay, Joe Pantoliano, Richard Masur
tomatoConsensus: Featuring one of Tom Cruise's best early performances, Risky Business is a sharp, funny examination of teen angst that doesn't stop short of exploring dark themes.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 2 nominations.
